channel.title: CVE Feed for ACD Systems -- Canvas Draw
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ACD Systems -- Canvas Draw

item.title: CVE-2018-3859|2024-09-17T00:26:11.672Z -- acd%20systems -- canvas%20draw
item.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds write exists in the TIFF parsing functionality of Canvas Draw version 4.0.0. A specially crafted TIFF image processed via the application can lead to an out-of-bounds write, overwriting arbitrary data. An attacker can deliver a TIFF image to trigger this vulnerability and gain code execution. A different vulnerability than CVE-2018-3860.

item.title: CVE-2018-3871|2024-09-17T01:40:35.132Z -- acd%20systems -- canvas%20draw
item.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds write exists in the PCX parsing functionality of Canvas Draw version 4.0.0. A specially crafted PCX image processed via the application can lead to an out-of-bounds write, overwriting arbitrary data. An attacker can deliver a PCX image to trigger this vulnerability and gain code execution. A different vulnerability than CVE-2018-3870.

item.title: CVE-2018-3857|2024-09-17T03:28:33.561Z -- acd%20systems -- canvas%20draw
item.description: An exploitable heap overflow exists in the TIFF parsing functionality of Canvas Draw version 4.0.0. A specially crafted TIFF image processed via the application can lead to an out-of-bounds write, overwriting arbitrary data. An attacker can deliver a TIFF image to trigger this vulnerability and gain code execution. A different vulnerability than CVE-2018-3858.
